item.title: COVID Web Scraper
item.description: The full git repository for this project can be found here. Table of Contents Project Intent Data Sources Setup and Running Helper Function Explanations Project Intent This web scraping tool collects COVID data from two sources (John Hopkins Github and the COVID Tracking Project), reformats the datetime information, determines what data is new, and appends it into the master dataset. This web scraper uses two methods for data collection: using the Selenium module and associated Chromedriver to navigate to the COVID Tracking Project website and pull daily case data from their API, and launching a git shell to pull ____ from the Johns Hopkins COVID19 data repo.

item.title: About
item.description: Interests I’m an avid cycler, reader, and musician. I love spending time with my 100-year old grandmother. Jazz At Binghamton University, I was a member of the Hapur Jazz Orchestra as the lead alto saxophone player. I was also the president of the Harpur Jazz Project, the student group responsible for organizing performances feature world class jazz musicians. Grammy winners Pat Metheny and Bela Fleck and the Flecktones I’ve played with Joe Lovano, Tony Kadleck,
